name: Restricted Controls
description:
The goal of this game is to survive the longest time possible. You can't win and your score isn't shown on screen sorry.

Controls : arrows to move, zqsd to dash ,escape to open the shop,e for shield

You can only move in the directions of the arrows in the bottom of the screen which are randomly change every 5 seconds. Some Power-Ups and some coins will spawn in the screen. You can dash in every direction for one coin, even if you can't move in this ddirection. The coins also allows you to buy new movement possiblities (if you buy them all, you have access to a new movement possibilities and a new power-up).

There are 4 power-ups :

-Potion : heals 1 heart

-Magic shield : invibility for the next hit you take

-Shield : you can click "e" to get complete invicibility for 3 seconds

-Movement : you can go into every direction(need to be unlocked first)

There are 3 ennemies :

-Basic Monster : a hit = a life lost

-Ghost : same but he is less visible

-Monster Eye : paralize you for 5 seconds

Made in 2 days.
